manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,

rules.description: Mouse-5 (hold): Look up word under cursor in Dictionary, (tap): send F16
R-⇧: search selected text / open URL

to_if_alone.shell_command: SEL=$(pbpaste) ; if [[ "$SEL" =~ ^[[:space:]]*http.*[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then open "$(echo "$SEL" | sed 's/ //g')" ; else open "https://www.google.com/search?q=$SEL" ; fi

rules.description: Mouse-4 (hold): search selected text / open URL, (tap): send F13

to_if_held_down.shell_command: SEL=$(pbpaste) ; if [[ "$SEL" =~ ^[[:space:]]*http.*[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then open "$(echo "$SEL" | sed 's/ //g')" ; else open "https://www.google.com/search?q=$SEL" ; fi

conditions.description: So fn from foot-pedal doesn't trigger emojis
